He brings the supplies back from Erlian city, China. He stopped the business for a while due to his new child's birth. His shop counter is located in the big market in the village. Therefore, he has many regular customers who appreciate the goods he sells. Now, he is planning to continue his business by getting the supplies in large quantities. He is an active, hardworking guy who says, "I would like to continue and expand my business to improve my family's livelihood and save for my three children's future". The total amount he is requesting is 500,000 MNT for the supplies.
"

loans.use: To purchase more garments to sell

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Rosemarie is a married woman who has two children. Rosemarie is 25 years old and resides in Upper Bayao, Tukuran Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. Rosemarie owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living. She been in the business for two years.  Each month, she earns 1,500 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 2,000 PHP to purchase new items to expand her product offering. In 2010, Rosemarie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Rosemarie wants to build a house and have her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to sell

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is from Militar, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 43 years old, married, and has five children. Fe owns and operates a business raising fish to sell. She has been in her business for seven years and earns 3,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Fe joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Fe is requesting a new loan of 6,500 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional fish to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to raise

loans.name: Roche Mhar

texts.en:
Roche Mhar is 23 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Roche Mhar runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell.

Roche Mhar has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, egg, spices, etc.

In the future, Roche Mhar would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Jenny Ann

texts.en:
Jenny Ann is 33 years old and married with three children.

Jenny Ann works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requests a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell.

Jenny Ann has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 16 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Jenny Ann aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell.

loans.name: Lenny

texts.en:
Lenny is 39 years old and married with two children.

Lenny works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requests a PHP 22000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell.

Lenny has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from food vending.

Lenny aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other equipment for her fishing business.

Maribeth has been in this business for 35 years. Maribeth earns more income from raising pigs.

Maribeth has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to build and expand her fish cage in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 42 years old. Nelly is married and has two children. 

To make a living, Nelly  is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community. Nelly has been in her business for three years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Nelly is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offerings. Earlier this year, Nelly joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to save the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to sell

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 47 years old. Marilou is a widow and has five children. To make a living, Marilou owns and operates a business venture, making and selling snack foods in the local community. Marilou has been in her business for eight years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Marilou joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Marilou is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional snacks to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional snacks to sell

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Nida

texts.en: Nida is a married woman who has three children. Nida is 42 years old, residing at Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. Nida owns and operates a business selling seafood products including fish and shrimp in the local community to earn a living, and she's been in this business 10 years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to repair her fishing boat. Nida has been a member of GDMPC since 2011. In the future, Nida wants to build a house and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a married woman with one child. Juliet is 21 years old and resides in Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Juliet owns & operates a business selling seafood products including fish and shrimp in the local community to earn a living and she's been in this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 3,500 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to repair her fishing boat. In 2008, Juliet became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Juliet wants to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to repair her fishing boat

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 58 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Carmen runs an ambulant business vending plastic wares in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of plastic ware.

Carmen has been in this business for 41 years.

In the future, Carmen would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more plastic ware

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr: Abdoulaye est un agriculteur qui pratique aussi l'élevage.Il est marié et père de trois enfants.Ses activités lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins et à ceux de sa famille.Afin de renforcer son activité, il sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter 3 boeufs. Son ambition et d'élargir sa capacité.
texts.en:
Abdoulaye is a farmer who also breeds livestock. He is married and the father of 3 children. His business activities enable him to meet his own needs as well as those of his family.

In order to strengthen his business, Abdoulaye is requesting a 400 000 francs to buy 3 oxen. His ambition is to expand his capacity.

loans.use: to buy 3 oxen.

loans.name: Djiby

texts.fr: Monsieur Djiby est un vieux de 62 ans qui évolue dans le secteur  de l’agriculture. Il gère un champ et  c’est une activité qu’il a choisi par nécessité. Il a déjà remboursé 2 prêts  antérieurs  au sein du guichet de l’U-IMCEC ou il est sociétaire.  Il sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour  l’achat de nouvelles semences  pour son champ. Ce financement lui permettra d’accroitre ses rendements, d’augmenter ses revenus pour mieux se prendre en charge.
texts.en: Djiby is 62 years old and involved in agriculture.  He manages a field, an activity he has chosen out of necessity.  He has already repaid 2 previous loans to the UIMCEC branch where he is a member.  He is requesting a loan of 150,000 francs.  With this loan he is planning to buy additional seeds for his field.  This loan will allow him to increase his productivity and income, so that Djiby can better provide for himself.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Ngor

texts.fr: Ngor est un homme marié , père de cinq enfants. Il pratique depuis plusieurs années l'élevage et l'agriculture. Il achète des bœufs dans les marchés hebdomadaires, les engraisse pendant 8 mois puis les revend. Cette activité lui permet d'obtenir des revenus assez consistants pour entretenir sa famille. Afin de faire une nouvelle opération d'embauche, il sollicite un prêt de 400000 f pour acheter 3 bœufs et de l'aliment bétail. Son ambition est de toujours continuer à renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
Ngor is married and father to 5 children. He has been farming and breeding livestock for several years. He buys oxen at the weekly markets, fattens them up during 8 months, and then resells them. This business allows him to earn fairly a consistent income with which to take care of his family.

In order to begin a new buying exercise, Ngor is requesting a loan of 400 000 francs with which to buy 3 oxen and some cattle feed. His aim is to keep strengthening his business.

loans.use: to buy 3 oxen and some cattle feed.

loans.name: Kuña Ñembyaty Mba´apora Group

texts.es:
El comité “Kuña Ñembyaty Mba´apora´´, esta situado en la ciudad de Villa Ygatimi en una Colonia en una comunidad indígena. Actualmente se encuentran en el primer ciclo, con doce integrantes en la cual todas son mujeres indígenas, han demostrado unión y solidaridad entre las compañeras y son muy trabajadoras hoy ya hacen parte del Comité de la Fundación Paraguaya.
Alfonza es una de las miembros  y ella nos comenta que se dedica a la cría de varios animales de corral, como ser chanchos, gallinas, patos, etc. Es gracias a este trabajo que ha podido ayudar a su familia y darles el pan de cada día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de alimentos para sus animales, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y creciendo. Su meta es poder tener una granja grande y tener muchos animales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Kuña Ñembyaty Mba'apora" is located in the city of Villa Ygatimi in a residential area of an indigenous community.  The group is currently in its first loan cycle and is comprised of 12 members who are all indigenous women.  They have shown union and support among themselves and are very hard workers.  They belong to the Fundación Paraguaya Committee.

Alfonza, one of the members,  raises small animals such as pigs, chickens, ducks, etc.  Thanks to her work she has been able to support her family and put food on the table every day.

She is requesting a loan to buy animal feed so she can continue to work and grow her business.  Her goal is to have a larger farm with many animals.

loans.use: To buy animal feed.

loans.name: Mame Gueye

texts.fr: Madame Mame  Gueye est âgée  de 43 ans et habite au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le commerce et la vente de tissus et d’accessoires pour femmes. Elle a  déjà remboursé 3 prêts  antérieurs. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité. Elle est membre d’un  des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  et a déjà remboursé 3 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un prêt de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de nouvelles marchandises dans le but de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. Ce financement pourra  l’aider a  accroitre ses bénéfices, a  se prendre en charge et aussi a soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Mame Gueye is 43 years old and lives in Senegal. She sells fabrics and accessories for women. She chose her business out of necessity.

Mame Gueye is a member of a UIMCEC branch and has already repaid 3 previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs in order to buy new merchandise so that she can meet her customer demand. This loan could help her to increase her profits, take care of herself and support her husband with meeting the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and accessories for resale.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
La Sra. Soledad tiene 34 años,  está casada con el Sr. Eliseo de 39 años, tienen 3 hijos, uno de 11 que está cursando sus estudios primarios, otra de 5años  que también está iniciando sus estudios primarios  y otro 1 año.
La Sra. Soledad se dedica a la contabilidad, lleva el estado contable de algunas empresas, pero comenta que aunque trabaje mucho hay veces que el dinero no es sufriente, es por ello que ella y su esposo siempre se esfuerzan al máximo para poder dar a sus hijos lo que necesitan para una vida mejor.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de una computadora, la cual le facilitará mucho el trabajo que hace, pues lo estaba haciendo en una computadora muy vieja y que le hacia muy difícil trabajar y de esa forma le es muy difícil. Agradece por esta oportunidad de progreso que está recibiendo
texts.en:
Mrs. Soledad is 34 years old, married to Mr. Eliseo, 39, and they have three children, an 11-year-old who is in grade school, a 5-year-old just beginning grade school and a one-year-old.

Soledad is an accountant who provides service to several companies.  She says that even though she works hard, many times there is not enough money so she and her husband are always doing their best to give their children what they need to lead a better lifestyle.

She is requesting a loan to buy a computer to make her work easier, since now she works on an old computer which makes her job harder.  She is grateful for this opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy a computer.

loans.name: Justimiano

texts.es:
La Sr  Justimiano  está  casado,  tiene una pequeña despensa ,  la venta del  mismo es gratificante ya que cuenta con una considerable cantidad de clientes y el ingreso es bastante satisfactorio.
Con la ayuda de su esposa e hijas están  saliendo adelante con voluntad, trabajo y dedicación. Hoy día se ha convertido en una microempresario exitoso y en constante progreso. Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus compromisos por lo que debemos brindarle todo el apoyo necesario.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lácteos y demás artículos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá abastecer su negocio y a la vez ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Justimiano is married and has a small store where he enjoys attending to his many customers.  The income he makes is quite satisfactory.

With the help of his wife and daughters, he is able to get ahead with hard work and dedication.  He has become a successful micro-entrepreneur with constant growth.  He has proven himself to be responsible and honest with his commitments and this is why we must give him the necessary support.

He is requesting a loan to buy beverages, groceries, dairy products and other essential items to restock his store and offer a wider variety of products to customers.

loans.use: To buy essential goods.

loans.name: Janete

texts.es:
La Sra. Janete es Brasilera, pero vive en Paraguay hace mas de 20 años, es madre de 3 hijos, 2 mayores de edad y una menor. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos  y también a la venta de joyas de plata hace varios años, cuenta con clientela formada, ya es reconocida por su actividad y su carisma para la venta de sus productos. 
Ella comenta que por medio de este trabajo dio a su hijo la educación que ellos necesitaban, y gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio ahora ya son profesionales. Desea poder seguir trabajando y creciendo como comerciante.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos y joyas, ya que tiene varios pedidos y quiere poder cumplir con estos. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que le están dando para progresar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Janete is Brazilian but has lived in Paraguay for over 20 years.  She is the mother of three children, two adults and one minor.  For several years she has been selling cosmetics and silver jewelry and has a fixed customer base.  She is well-known in her business and for her charisma in selling her products.

She tells us that through her work she has been able to give her children the education they needed, and thanks to her efforts and sacrifice they are professionals.  She wants to continue working and growing as a merchant.

The loan she is requesting is to buy cosmetics and jewelry since she has many orders to fill.  She is grateful to the foundation and Kiva for this opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Ilse

texts.es:
La Sra. Ilse es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, es soltera, y tiene dos hijos menores que van a la escuela. Ella tiene una despensa - mercería en su domicilio, ya hace 4 años que logro abrir su negocio.
Anteriormente trabajaba en un comercial y logró juntar un poco de dinero y después se propuso y abrió su propio negocio. Su meta es seguir creciendo y de esa forma ayudar a su familia. Solicita dicho crédito para la compras de útiles escolares ya que se inicia el año escolar y desea poder tener bien abastecida su mercería. Sueña con abrir un distribuidora y dar trabajo a las personas de su comunidades
texts.en:
Mrs. Ilse is from the city of San Lorenzo.  She is single and has two minor children who go to school.  She runs a general that store she opened in her home four years ago.  

Previously, she worked in a shopping center and was able to save enough money to open her own business.  Her goal is to keep growing and support her family.  She is requesting a loan to buy school supplies for the upcoming school season, with the idea of having her store well-stocked.  She would like to become a distributor and offer employment to people in her community.

loans.use: To buy school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Rokhiyatou

texts.fr: Rokhiyatou est une femme mariée mariée sans enfant. Elle a arrêté ses études au collège et,après une formation d e5 ans,elle a ouvert un atelier de couture chez elle. Aujourd'hui, elle dispose de 5 machine à coudre et arrive à générer des revenus qui lui permettent de se prendre en charge et de satisfaire les besoins de sa famille. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un prêt de 400000f pour acheter une machine à coudre et des accessoires. Son ambition est de renforcer ses équipements.
texts.en: Rokhiyatou is a married woman with no children. She left school at secondary level, and after training for five years opened a dressmaking workshop at home. Today she has five sewing machines and manages to generate sufficient income to take care of herself and provide for her family's needs. She is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs to boost her business by buying a sewing machine and accessories. Her ambition is to reinforce her equipment.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and accessories

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
El señor Marcos es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene 34 años de edad, se dedica a la construcción hace mas de 10 años, y comenta que tiene muy buena madera para esto, ya que siempre tiene muy buen trabajo para hacer y es solicitado para muchas obras.
El señor Marcos es una persona muy sacrificada y profesional en su trabajo, siempre trata de dar lo mejor en su actividad y agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y a Kiva por la oportunidad para compartir con todos su vida profesional. Su meta es seguir trabajando y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para el día a día.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas, lo que le permitirá hacer un mejor trabajo y servir mejor. Agradece la oportunidad que recibe, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Marcos is from the city of Itá.  He is 34 years old and he has been working in the building trade for more than 10 years.  He says that he is very skilled at this kind of work.  He always does very good work and is requested for a lot of jobs.

Marcos is a very selfless person and professional in his work.  He always tries to give his best at work and is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for this opportunity to share his professional life with everybody.  His goal is to continue working so that he can help his family and provide them with what they need.

Marcos is requesting a loan to buy tools which will allow him to do a better job and serve people better.  He is grateful for the opportunity that he is being given as it will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Ousmane est un homme marié, père de 3 enfants, tous élèves. Il est un ancien footballeur qui a fait les beaux jours du club de sa ville. Parallèlement au sport, il été embauché dans une boulangerie qu'il finira par acheter avec l'appui de sa famille. Aujourd'hui, il emploie près de 5 personnes dont deux de ses frères.Il a ouvert également, il y'a 3 mois, une alimentation qu'il gère lui même.Cette diversité de ses activités lui permet d'obtenir des revenus assez substantiels pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des sacs de farine et des produits alimentaires. Son ambition est de renforcer ses activités.
texts.en: Ousmane is a married man who is father to three grown-up children. He is a former footbballer who spent his heyday playing for the club in his town. At the same time as doing his sport he was employed by a bakery, and he ended up buying this with help from his family. Today he employs five people, including two of his brothers. He also opened a grocery store three months ago and he runs this himself. The diversity of his businesses allows him to make quite substantial income so that he can provide for his needs and those of his family. In order to strengthen his business, he is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs so that he can buy sacks of flour and groceries. His ambition is to build up his businesses.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour and groceries

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.es:
La Señora Anastacia es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene 52 años, está casada con el Señor Marcos de profesión albañil, con quien tiene varios hijos de los cuales dos se encuentran viviendo aun con ella. Ambos se encuentran trabajando y ayudando a sus respectivas  madres.
Anastacia tiene una pequeña despensa, donde surte a sus vecinos y clientes ocasionales, brindando mejores precios, calidad y variedad de sus productos. Es una señora muy trabajadora y humilde que se encuentra trabajando hace varios años con la Fundación paraguaya y está muy agradecida por la confianza otorgada.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, azúcar, arroz, fideos, lácteos y demás insumos necesarios para abastecer su negocio, y con lo cual seguirá trabajando.
texts.en:
Anastacia is from the city of Itá.  She is 52 years old and married to Marcos who is a builder.  The couple have several children, two of whom are still living with them.  They both work and help their mother.  

Anastacia has a small grocery store where she supplies her neighbors and casual customers, providing them with the best prices, quality and variety of products.  She is a very hard-working and unassuming lady who has been working with Fundación Paraguaya for several years.  She is very grateful for the trust they have placed in her.

Anastacia is requesting this loan to buy drinks, sugar, rice, noodles, dairy products and other supplies she needs to stock her business.  This will allow her to keep working.

loans.use: to buy basic household products to sell

loans.name: Abdou Salam

texts.fr: Abdou est un  homme marié , père de 7 enfants. Il pratique la construction mais aussi le montage de projet .Avec les marchés de bâtiments qu'il gagne , il parvient à obtenir des revenus qui lui permettent d'entretenir sa famille. Afin de compléter son capital pour l'ouverture d'une station service de nettoyage de véhicule, il sollicite un pret de 5000000f. Son ambition est de s'engager dans l'immobilier.
texts.en: Abdou is a married man who is father to seven children. He is a builder but also puts together projects. With the profits he makes from buildings he manages to make sufficient income to look after his family. In order to top up his capital for the opening of a car cleaning service station, he is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs. His ambition is to involve himself in the real estate market.

loans.use: to open a car cleaning service station

loans.name: Mairoby Odalia

texts.es:
Mairoby Odalia tiene 43  años es soltera, vive con los hijos. Vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla EL SAGRADO CORAZON, esta ventanilla se encuentra ubicada en el sector de las calles Ernesto Briones y Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica al Comercio.

Mairoby Odaliza se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa de niños y adultos, además de sabanas y artículos de belleza para mujeres.El dinero es para la comprar de ropa y articulos de belleza.

Las compras de los insumos las realiza en la ciudad de Guayaquil en la Bahía. El crédito les ayudado a aumentar la producción y tener productos de calidad, el sueño de Mairoby  es tener dinero para seguir invirtiendo, ha enfrentado desafíos como los precios altos y la competencia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse al hogar.
texts.en:
Mairoby Odalia is 43 years old and single.  She lives with her children en El Cantón Ventanas in the Province of Los Ríos.

Her communal banking group is called El Sagrado Corazon.  This group is located at the cross streets of Ernesto Briones and Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, which is in the town of Cantón Ventanas.  This group is dedicated to commerce.

Mairoby Odalia is dedicated to the business of selling clothes for children and adults, as well as sheets and beauty products for women.  The money is to buy clothing and beauty products.

She does her grocery shopping in the city of Guayaquil in the Bay.  The credit has helped her group increase their production and the quality of their products.  Mairoby's dream is to have money in order to continue investing.  She has faced challenges like high prices and competition.  

In her free time she likes to work around the house.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and beauty products.

loans.name: Ojo De Agua Group

texts.es:
Janitzio tiene 25 años de edad es parte del grupo “Ojo de Agua” comenta que sus compañeros le pusieron ese nombre porque muy cerca de donde se reúnen hay un nacimiento de agua y le dicen así. El se dedica a la venta de fruta de temporada platica que parte de la fruta que vende el la cultiva y la otra parte el la compra en la central de abastos de una población cercana a la de él, dice que tiene con su negocio desde hace 10 años que desde muy jovencito él le ayudaba a sus padres a vender en los tianguis y en las calles de varias localidades. Janitzio está pidiendo un crédito para la compra de fruta como durazno, aguacate, zarzamora, coliflor, lechuga, espinacas, zanahorias etc. También dice que comprara abono y fertilizantes ya que tiene una huerta de aguacate y tiene aproximadamente 50 árboles de los cuales nada mas 30 dan producción de ese fruto. Una de sus dificultades que se le dificulta transportar sus frutos por que le cobran mucho de flete, a él le gustaría tener un vehículo propio por eso le está echando ganas a su trabajo para poder comprar una camioneta de uso y para seguir sembrando mas plantas de aguacate ya que es un buen negocio, también le encantaría tener vacas, puercos y borregos para tener el futuro de sus hijos asegurado. El está casado con la señora Carolina la cual es ama de casa y tienen 2 niños el mayor de 9 años y el menor de un año ocho meses.
Los otros cinco integrantes del grupo se llaman Maribel, Adela, Felisa, Maria Ysabel, Miguel, ellos invertirán sus créditos en la compra de productos de belleza por catalogo para su venta y para la compra y venta de frutas y legumbres de temporada.
texts.en:
Janitzio is 25 years old and a member of the 'Ojo de Agua' group.  He says that his fellow members gave the group this name because there is a water source very near where they meet with this name.  

Janitzio's business is selling seasonal fruit.  He says that he grows some of the fruit he sells himself and buys the rest in the wholesale food market in a nearby town.  He says that he has been in this business for ten years, since he was very young.  He used to help his parents sell in the markets and streets in different towns.  Janitzio is requesting a loan to buy fruit such as peaches, avocados, blackberries, cauliflowers, lettuce, spinach, carrots, etc.  He says that he will also buy manure and fertilizers because he has an avocado orchard with approximately 50 trees but only 30 are producing.  One of the difficulties that he has is transporting his fruit because it costs a lot to pay somebody to do this.  He would like to have his own vehicle and he is working hard so that he can buy a used truck.  He would also like to continue sowing more avocado plants because this is a good business, and he would love to own cows, pigs and lambs so that he can guarantee his children's future.

Janitzio is married to Carolina who is a homemaker.  They have two children who are 9 years old and 20 months old.  The other five members of this group are Maribel, Adela, Felisa, Maria Ysabel and Miguel.  They will invest their loans in buying catalog beauty products and seasonal fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Flores De Rio Group

texts.es:
Ausencia cuenta con 60 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando Adilene esta en 2° de cbta, Neli esta en 4° de primaria y Bryam esta en 1° de preescolar, su esposo se llama sirenio es albañil, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos y dulces lo cual dice que le va muy bien con el negocio e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de refrescos de varios sabores y de dulces doña ausencia dice que le gustaría incrementar mas el negocio pero que lo hará poco a poco con calma espera sacarlo adelante como hasta ahora ya que el préstamo fue de gran utilidad.

Ausencia  pertenece al grupo flores de rió el cual esta integrado por 12 miembros dos hombres y diez mujeres las cuales todas trabajan a continuación serán mencionados: Virginia, Flor del Carmen, Celerina, Freddy, Nicolasa, Demecia, Igudina, Santos, Estela, Maria Elvia, Jennifer, todos realizan una actividad comercial como son: tamales, refrescos, pan, jugos, dulces, pizzas, perfumes, cosméticos,  carnicería, etc.
texts.en:
Ausencia is 60 years old, married, and has four children.  Adilene is in her second year of CBTA (an upper-middle level agricultural education institution), Neli is in her fourth year of elementary school and Bryam is in the first year of pre-school.  Her husband is called Sirenio and he is a builder.  Ausencia's business is selling soft drinks and sweet treats.  She says that her business is doing very well and she will invest her loan in buying different flavors of soft drink and sweet treats.  Ausencia says that she would like to further expand her business but she will do it gradually and calmly.  She hopes to continue making progress as she has up to now as her previous loan was very useful.

Ausencia belongs to the 'Flores de Rio' group which has twelve members: two men and ten women.  They all work and their names are Virginia, Flor del Carmen, Celerina, Freddy, Nicolasa, Demecia, Igudina, Santos, Estela, Maria Elvia and Jennifer.  They all have their own business activity such as: selling tamales, soft drinks, bread, juice, sweet treats, pizzas, perfume, cosmetics, meat, etc.

loans.use: to buy different flavored drinks and sweet treats

loans.name: Malick

texts.fr: Monsieur Malick habite dans lune des banlieues sénégalaises. Il s’active dans le secteur de l’élevage de moutons. C’est une activité qu’il a choisi par nécessité dans le but d’augmenter ses revenus. L est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation et a déjà remboursé 2 crédits antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de quelques petits moutons a élever et qui seront destinés a la vente. Son souhait est  renforcer le nombre de bétail qu’il possède pour éventuellement accroitre ses revenus et améliorer son niveau de vie.
texts.en:
Malick lives in a Senegalese suburb. He raises sheep. He chose this line of work out of necessity, with the aim of augmenting his income.

Malick is a member of his local UIMCEC branch and has already repaid 2 previous loans. He is requesting a loan of 100 000 francs, with which to buy some young sheep to raise and then resell. He wishes to boost the number of livestock he owns so that he can eventually increase his income and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy ewes to raise and later resell.

loans.name: Mande 2 Group

texts.fr:
Mme ABIBATA est la représentante du groupe MANDE 2. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus  âgée 15ans et le moins âgée a 07ans. Tous  vont  à l’école et elle a 03 personnes à sa charge.

Mme vend des légumes depuis 02ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de  pissy .Ses clients sont les  hommes et femmes.

Mme veut  s’acheter  01 sac de gombo sec ; 50kg de choux et 50kg d’aubergine.

Elle épargne ses bénéfices pour  agrandir son hangard. Mme ambitionne  ouvrir une boutique de stockage pour les légumes et scolarisé ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs. Abibata is the representative of the Mande 2 Group. She is married and the mother of three children. The eldest is 15 years old and the youngest is 7. All of them attend school and she has three people in her care.

Mrs. Abibata has been selling vegetables for two years. She gets her supplies at the market in Pissy. Her customers are men and women.

Mrs. Abibata wants to purchase herself one sack of dried okra, 50kg of cabbage and 50kg of eggplant.

She is saving her profits in order to expand her covered stall. Mrs. Abibata aims to open a vegetable warehouse and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase herself one sack of dried okra, 50kg of cabbage and 50kg of eggplant.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
La socia   Haydee sigue pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” y continua viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco y donde también realiza sus actividades económicas. 

La socia Haydee ya no se dedica a  la venta de comida pues le fue muy mal pero ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora sigue adelante pues ahora se dedica a la venta de helados de forma ambulatoria.  En esta oportunidad Haydee requiere el préstamo para compra mas helados.  

La socia Haydee agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en: The associate Haydee belongs to the communal bank “IMASUMAC II” and still lives in the city of Cusco where she also conducts her economic activities. Haydee is no longer engaged in the selling of food because it went very poorly.  However, she is an entrepreneurial and hard-working woman who continues moving forward.  Now she sells ice cream out of a cart. At this time Haydee needs a loan to buy more ice cream. The associate Haydee gives thanks for the support that has been given and at the same time she is committed to comply in a disciplined manner with the loan repayments.

loans.use: to purchase more ice creams

loans.name: Mauricio Alberto

texts.es: Mauricio Alberto de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia. El posee un pequeño negocio donde vende diferentes tipos de accesorios por servicios que presta a los clientes, últimamente ha tenido más demanda por su trabajo, pues es de muy buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable; Mauricio es un hombre emprendedor con muchos deseos de superarse y cumplir todas sus metas, le gusta estar activo en su negocio por eso siempre se mantiene adelante de la competencia, para él lo más importante es la dedicación y el amor que se le da a la labor, quiere satisfacer a cada uno de sus clientes y hacer crecer el negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar navajas, accesorios para celular, relojes entre otros. Mauricio tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mauricio Alberto is 44 years old and lives with his life partner in his own home.  He has a small business where he sells different types of accessories for services that he provides to his customers.  He has recently experienced an increase in demand as his products are very good quality and affordable.  In addition, his service is second to none.  Mauricio is an entrepreneurial man who has a great desire to do well and achieve all his goals.  He likes to be active in his business and this is why he is always ahead of the competition.  The most important thing for him is the commitment and love that he has for his work.  He would like to please all of his customers and grow his business.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy penknives, cell phone accessories, watches, etc.  Mauricio is confident that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy penknives, cell phone accessories and watches

loans.name: La Estacion Group

texts.es:
La señora Victoria es uno de los miembros de un grupo llamado la estacion el cual esta integrado por nueve personas muy unidas, trabajadoras y amable, cada una de estas personas tiene una actividad economica la cual desempeña para sacar adelante a sus familias y asi poder darles una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en una comunidad la cual se caracteriza por estar en una zona cañera.




la señora victoria tiene la edad de 27 años, solo estudio la primaria y es madre soltera de dos hijos el mayor de nombre Rodolfo que tiene 7 años de edad y estudia la primaria y una niña de Alexandra de 6 años que asiste al preescolar. Ella nos platica que siempre a tenido que trabajar para sacar a su familia adelante pero que hace un poco mas de 8 meses abrio una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en un local que tiene en la parte de enfrente a su casa en el cual vende todos los dias de ocho de la mañana a ocho de la noche, apesar de que su negocio es nuevo en su colonia ya tiene muchos clientes los cuales le hacen el gasto, ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de leche,huevos, detergentes, refrescos, dulces, aceite, frijol, papel higienico,servilletas, galletas, sopa, cafe y azucar para resurtir su negocio, ella espera que ya que su negocio este mas surtido atraiga mas clientes para poder aumentar sus venta y ganancias y continuar invirtiendo en el negocio y dar a sus hijos mejor calidad de vida. ella dijo"no me gusta hacer planes a futuro porque luego no salen pero lo que mas deseo es darle estudios a mis hijos"

Este grupo agradece a la fundacion por el prestamo que se les ha otorgado.

los demas mienbros del grupo son:

Fabian  venta de refrescos 
rafael satreria 
irais taqueria 
rodrigo rotulos publicitarios
rodolfina venta de frutas  y legunbre 
maria juana venta de refrescos 
Maximina  venta de ropa
erika venta de antojitos mexicanos
texts.en:
Victoria is one of the members of a group called La Estacion which is made up of nine very close, hardworking and kind people. Each of these people has an economic activity which he or she does to get their families ahead and thus give them a better quality of life. This group is located in a community which is described as being in a sugar cane region. 

Victoria  is 27 years old. She only went to primary school and she is a single mother of two children. The oldest is named Rodolfo. He is 7 years old and goes to primary school. She also has a daughter named Alexandra, who is 6 and in pre-school. She tells us that she has always had to work to get her family ahead, but a little more than 8 months ago she opened a small grocery store in a locale that she has in the front part of her house. She sells there every day from eight in the morning until eight at night. Despite her business being new she already has a lot of customers in her neighborhood who buy from her. She needs this loan to invest in buying milk, eggs, detergents, beverages, candies, oil, beans, toilet paper, napkins, cookies, soup, coffee and sugar to re-stock her store. She hopes that when her business is better stocked she can attract more customers and increase her sales and earnings and continue to invest in the business and give her children a better quality of life. She said "I don't like to make plans for the future because then they don't turn out, but what I want the most is to give my children an education." 

This group s grateful to the foundation for the loan that it has been given.  

The other members of the group are:

Fabian:  selling beverages
Rafael: tailoring
Irais: selling tacos  
Rodrigo:  advertising logos
Rodolfina: selling fruits and vegetables 
Maria Juana: selling beverages 
Maximina: selling clothes 
Erika Venta: selling Mexican snacks

loans.use: to buy milk, eggs, detergents, beverages, candies, oil, beans, toilet paper, napkins, cookies, soup, coffee and sugar.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una granja y tiene criadero de gallina y de pollo, es muy conocido en la localidad por lo tanto es muy solicitado su producto, últimamente ha aumentado más la demanda pues los pollos y los huevos que vende son de muy buena calidad y a precios excelentes, además el servicio es único, Miguel siempre está muy contento y a la disposición de la clientela; es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto siempre a aprovechar oportunidades porque quiere superarse, piensa que siempre hay que trabajar y hacer lo que se puede hasta el final y él está totalmente decidido es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar más gallinas, pollos y concentrado. Miguel Ángel tiene la esperanza que así logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel is 57 years old and lives together with his life partner and children.  He owns a farm and raises hens and chickens.  He is very well known in his town and his products are very much in demand.  He has recently experienced an increase in demand as the chickens and eggs that he sells are very good quality and he sells them at excellent prices.  In addition, his service is very good.

Miguel is always very happy and at his customers' disposal.  He is an entrepreneurial man who is always ready to make the most of opportunities because he wants to do well.  He believes that you must always work and do what you can right up to the end and he is completely committed.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy more hens, chickens and concentrated feed.  He hopes that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hens, chickens and concentrated feed

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es: Zonia de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus cinco hijos. Ella posee una tortillería en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues sus tortillas son preparadas con material de primera calidad y a un buen precio, además son las que se entregan más rápido y calientitas; Zonia es una mujer muy activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante y triunfar, piensa que hay que prometerse ser siempre fuertes y constantes, para  al final del camino tener éxito y felicidad, está dispuesta a lograrlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor a fin de bajar el costo de materia prima y que su ganancia sean mejores. Zonia tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Zonia is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and five children.  She has a tortilla business in her home and is very well known in her area.  She has a lot of customers because her tortillas are made with good-quality ingredients and sold at a good price.  In addition, they are served very quickly and still warm.  Zonia is a very active woman who has a great desire to do well and succeed.  She believes that you must always remain strong and persevere if you want to be successful and happy at the end of the day and she is ready to do this.

Zonia is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy corn wholesale.  This will reduce the cost of her ingredients and she will make more profits.  Zonia believes that this will enable her to provide her family with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Evelyn Elizabeth

texts.es: Evelyn Elizabeth de veintisiete años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar donde reside, ahí vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, leche, entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de más clientela pues todo lo que comercía es producto de primera calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable; Evelyn es una mujer entregada al trabajo y con mucho entusiasmo de triunfar, piensa que la fuerza más grande para lograr ese éxito es la voluntad, tiene toda lo que necesita, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, bebidas, papel etc. Evelyn Elizabeth tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Evelyn Elizabeth is twenty-seven years old and she lives with her life's companion and her children. She has a store located in her home. There she sells basic necessity products such as rice, beans, milk, and more. Lately she has gained more customers because everything she sells is of the best quality and at very accessible prices. In addition, the service is un equaled. Evelyn is a woman who is very dedicated to her work who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead. She thinks that the biggest strength for success is her will and she has she needs. That is why she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, snacks, bread, drinks, paper, etc. Evelyn Elizabeth is confident that in this way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, beverages, and paper.

loans.name: María Celia

texts.es: María Celia de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia. Ella posee una panadería en el lugar de su residencia la cual es muy visitada por las personas del lugar, últimamente ha tenido más demanda, pues su producto es delicioso hecho con material de excelente calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer activa, muy enérgica se levanta desde muy temprano a comenzar su labor, tiene  muchas metas que se ha propuesto alcanzar  y está dispuesta a lograrlo, piensa que para tener éxito, la actitud es igual de importante que la habilidad, y ella tiene toda la actitud positiva, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, levadura, bandejas entre otros. María Celia tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar a su hogar una mejor situación económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
María Celia is 49 years old and lives together with her life partner in her own home.  She has a bakery in her home which is very popular with local people.  She has recently experienced an increase in demand as her products are delicious.  They are made from top-quality ingredients and sold at really affordable prices.  In addition, her service is excellent.

María is an active woman who is full of energy.  She gets up very early in the morning to start her work.  She has many goals which she has set herself and she is ready to achieve them.  She believes that, in order to be successful, your attitude is just as important as your skill.  María's attitude is all positive.  

María decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that she could buy flour wholesale, sugar, yeast, trays, etc.  She is certain that this will enable her to put her household in a better financial situation and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour wholesale, sugar, yeast and trays

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: Nelson Antonio de 33 años de edad, habita junto a su familia, la cual está conformada por su esposa y un hijo el cual  se encuentra estudiando. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace más de 6 años.  Vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, café, azúcar, jabón, bebidas, papel, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Su sueño es ver a su hijo convertido como un gran profesional, con mejores oportunidades a las que él tuvo. Todo esto le da fuerza a esforzarse cada día más, ya que no pierde la esperanza de que un día su sueño se haga realidad. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su tienda en la compra de mercadería al por mayor, con el fin de aumentar su inventario que le permita atraer a más clientes y mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos.  Esto lo ha llevado a considerar la solicitud de este crédito a INTEGRAL para llevar a cabo su plan. Con el crédito comprará variedad de productos de tienda como: café, aceite, bebidas, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. Tiene mucha confianza que de esta forma logrará lo que tanto anhela.
texts.en:
Nelson Antonio is 33 years old and lives with his family (his wife and his son who is in school).  Nelson has been running a store for more than six years.  He sells a variety of basic household products such as rice, beans, coffee, sugar, soap, drinks, toilet paper and other products that his customers want.  His dream is to see his son become a great professional with better opportunities than he had.  This gives him the strength to work harder and harder every day because he hopes that one day his dream will come true.

Nelson has decided to invest in his store by purchasing merchandise wholesale.  This will increase his stock, allowing him to attract more customers and improve his sales and income. He decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can carry out his plan.  He will use his loan to buy a variety of products for his store such as coffee, oil, drinks, candies, sugar, rice, beans and other products which will attract more customers.  He is very confident that this will enable him to achieve everything he hopes to.

loans.use: to buy coffee, oil, drinks, candies, sugar, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: María Luz

texts.es: María Luz de 56 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad es soltera y vive sola. Ella se dedica al comercio de ropa. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas donde ella habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia.  María se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora ya que tiene muchas ideas de negocio  y poco a poco va poniendo en  marcha. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener activo su negocio por más de 5 años. Gracias a su carisma se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas que la prefieren ya que ella siempre trata de tener variedad y buenos precios en las prendas de vestir que ofrece. Además tiene para todos los gustos y preferencias. Su sueño es mantener su negocio surtido con variedad de prendas de vestir con el objetivo de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de prendas de vestir (faldas, pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa interior, etc.), con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables.
texts.en:
María Luz is 56 years old and lives in her home which she owns.  She is single and lives alone.  Her business is selling clothing.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor in the main areas near her home.  María has been in this business for many years and she has a lot of experience.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who has many business ideas which she is gradually putting into practice.  With a lot of effort and commitment, she has managed to keep her business running for more than five years.  Thanks to her charm, she has gained the trust of many people who are loyal to her business because she always tries to have a good variety of products available and sells them at good prices.  She has products to suit every taste.

María's dream is to keep her business stocked with a good variety of clothing so that she can attract more customers.  This will allow her to improve her quality of life.  She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, buying garments such as skirts, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, etc.  She thereby hopes to improve her living conditions  She trusts in God that she will have favorable results.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es: Enrique de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una panadería en el lugar de su residencia y es muy conocido en la localidad, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el pan que comercia es de muy buena calidad, con un sabor exquisito y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es único; Enrique es un hombre entregado a su labor con muchas metas por alcanzar, piensa que la motivación es lo que te ayuda a empezar, pero es el hábito el que te mantiene firme en el camino, tiene todo lo necesario, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, dulce, gas propano entre otros. Enrique tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Enrique is 54 years old, lives with his partner and children in their own home. He owns a bakery in his home and is well known in his area. He has a lot of clientele since he sells high quality, delicious bread at reasonable prices. In addition to that he is the only one who offers this business. Enrique is a dedicated man to his work with many goals to achieve. He believes motivation is the first step to beginning something but its habits that maintain a firm finish. He has all of the necessities which is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale flour, sugar, candies, propane gas etc. Enrique has high hopes that with this support he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale flour, sugar, candies, propane gas etc

loans.name: Ana Teresa

texts.es: Ana Teresa de 43 años de edad, reside junto a su grupo familiar  el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus dos hijos de 15 y 7 años de edad, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ana  se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, honesta y con muchos deseos de superarse. Para ella lo más importante es su familia. No pierde las esperanzas de algún día ver a sus hijos convertidos en  profesionales y con mejores oportunidades de vida. Esto es lo que inspira a Ana  a trabajar duramente en su tienda  que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya logró ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. El objetivo de Ana es ampliar su negocio de tal manera que la capacidad del mismo sea más grande y lógre cubrir una mayor demanda. Esta inversión piensa hacerla por medio de un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para hacerlo por sus medios. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar productos de tienda al por mayor (aceite, café, jabón, pan dulce, golosinas, arroz, frijoles, etc.) para surtir su tienda y poder lográr su objetivo. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que así será.
texts.en: Ana Teresa is 43 years old and lives together with her family which is made up of her husband and her two children who are 15 and 7 years old and in school.  Ana is a hard-working, honest woman who has a great desire to do well.  Her family is the most important thing in the world to her.  She doesn't lose hope of some day seeing her children become professionals with better opportunities in life.  This is what inspires her to work hard in her store which she worked hard to set up.  She has been in this business for a long time and has managed to gain the trust of many people.  Ana's goal is to expand her business so that she has greater capacity and can satisfy greater demand.  She plans to make this investment with the aid of a loan because she doesn't have the necessary resources to do it herself.  She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy products for her store wholesale (oil, coffee, soap, sweet bread, candies, rice, beans, etc.).  She will use these products to stock her store and achieve her goal.  She trusts in almighty God that she will succeed.

loans.use: to buy oil, coffee, soap, sweet bread, candies, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 50 years old and married with 8 children. With 4 children in school, Daisy works very hard to provide for them.

Daisy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of  PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Daisy has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, toothpaste, spices, sardines, etc. 

In the future, Daisy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell

loans.name: Leydi Liliana

texts.es:
Leydi Liliana tiene 28 años es casada, vive con el esposo y con un hijo. Vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla EL SAGRADO CORAZON, esta ventanilla se encuentra ubicada en el sector de las calles Ernesto Briones y Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica al Comercio.

La Señora Leydi se dedica al negocio de Yambal, es decir a la venta de cosméticos por medio de revistas y a dar asesoría de belleza. El dinero es para invertir en cosmeticos de Yambal para exivir en el local.

Las compras de los insumos las realiza en la ciudad de Guayaquil por medio de correo electrónico. El crédito les ayudado a aumentar la producción y tener productos de calidad, el sueño de Leydi es tener un local propio, ha enfrentado desafíos como los precios altos y la competencia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer la limpieza en el hogar.
texts.en:
Leydi Liliana is 28 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and son. She lives in Cantón Ventanas in the Province of Los Rios. 

Her communal banking group is called El Sagrado Corazón (Sacred Heart).  This bank is located on the corner of Ernesto Briones and Parroquia 10 de Noviembre, in the town of Cantón Ventanas.  Her group is dedicated to commerce.

Mrs. Leydi dedicates herself to the business of selling Yambal brand cosmetics.  That is, the selling of cosmetics by means of magazines and the giving of beauty advice. The money is for investing in Yambal cosmetics in order to promote them locally.

She does her purchasing in the city of Guayaquil via email.  The loan helps her to increase production and improve the quality of her products.  Leydi's dream is to have her own local store.  She has faced challenges such as high prices and competition.  

In her free time, she likes to do housekeeping in her home.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar Armando de 51 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto con su esposa y dos hijos los cuales  ya son mayores de edad. Él se dedica a la compra  de chatarra al clientes de casa en casa y al acumularla vende a recolectores que reciclan y la procesan para reutilizarla, la actividad de recoleccion la realiza en las principales zonas donde  habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a ella por lo que ya tiene experiencia  y algunos clientes fijos que confían plenamente en él ya que es un hombre responsable y trabajador. Su sueño es dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida por lo que ha decidido invertir en su única fuente de ingreso y de tal forma que esto le permita aumentar sus niveles de ingresos que lo lleven a alcanzar su sueño. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar chatarra al por mayor que le permita abastecer una mayor demanda.  Él es un hombre muy trabajador y creyente el cual confía que de esta forma logrará el sueño de su vida.
texts.en:
Oscar Armando is 51 years old and lives in his family home together with his wife and two children who are already adults.  His business is buying scrap metal from customers, house to house, and then selling it to collectors who recycle it and process it so that it can be re-used.  He carries out his collections in the main areas near his home. 

Oscar has been in this business for many years and so he already has experience and some regular customers who have complete trust in him because he is a responsible and hard-working man.  His dream is to provide his family with better living conditions and so he has decided to invest in his only source of income so that he can increase his income and achieve his dream.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy scrap metal wholesale.  This will allow him to satisfy greater demand.  Oscar is a very hard-working man of strong faith who believes that he will be able to achieve his dream in this way.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal wholesale

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Merlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a variety store and from raising livestock. Merlinda is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and to repair her fishing boat.

Merlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to buy additional fishing boats.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and to repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.en:
Aracely is married with eight children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Aracely is 38 years old and has one child who is in school.

Aracely has a variety store business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more rice, detergent and other miscellaneous items.

She has been in this business for 3 years. Aracely would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, detergent and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario Alberto de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee un taller de estructura metálica en el lugar de su residencia, hace puertas, balcones, portones y todo lo que pidan sus clientes en metal, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente pues su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y todo a excelentes precios, además su servicio es inigualable; Mario es un hombre trabajador con muchos sueños por realizar, piensa que el éxito no es la clave de la felicidad, sino que la felicidad es la clave del éxito y con ese pensamiento tan acertado, es que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar metal por mayor. Mario Alberto tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Mario Alberto is 40 years old, lives with his life partner and children in their home. He owns a metal shop in his home. He makes doors, balconies, gates, and anything made of metal his clients request. His clientele has grown lately since he makes high quality pieces, offers them at reasonable prices, and his service is unbeatable. Mario is a hardworking man with many dreams to achieve. He believes that success is not the key to happiness but that happiness is what brings success. Its with this mentality that he decided to request INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale metal. Mario Alberto has high hopes that with this he will be able to offer his family a plentiful life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale metal.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María es un mujer de 26 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comida su historia empezó hace 3 años los fines de semana vende salchicha en el mercado y le va bien, su trabajo lo hace sola de las 7:30 hasta la hora que termine, si tiene dificultades que se les enfermen sus hijas, no está casada tiene unión libre, el esposo es despachador de la coop. Guayas, si tiene 2 hijas, su sueño más importante es incrementar sus ventas y tener casa propia. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar carnes, verduras, frutas para la venta de comida.
texts.en:
María is a 26-year-old woman who has a great desire to boost her food business over the next few years.

María started her business three years ago, selling sausage in the market on weekends.  The business is doing very well.  She works alone from 7.30am until she runs out.  Her difficulties are when her children become sick.  María is not married.  She lives with her common-law husband who is a dispatcher for the Guayas co-op.  She has two daughters.  María's biggest dream is to increase her sales and own her own home.  She would like a loan to buy meat, vegetables and fruit for her food business.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables and fruit for her food business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit, plantains and vegetables

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 65 years old and married with 11 children.

Clarita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business making sawali, or walls made from interwoven splits of bamboo, in the Philippines.  She has requested a loan of PHP 16000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for this business.

Clarita has borrowed and repaid 10 previous loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sawali-making business for 43 years. She also earns an income from dressmaking.

Clarita aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Sandra Del Transito

texts.es: Sandra del Transito de 36 años de edad, habita junto a sus 4 hijos los cuales son menores de edad. Sandra es  muy trabajadora, dedicada y luchadora. Hace ya varios años que logro establecer un pequeño puesto frente al Mercado Municipal de la zona donde habita, en el cual vende variedad de frutas y verduras. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha mantenido su negocio y gracias a Dios y al arduo trabajo que día a día realiza los resultados obtenidos han sido favorables. Además su carisma es incomparable, para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy concurrida y visitada por muchas personas, en especial el negocio de Sandra  ya que cada día son más las personas que se acercan en busca de los productos que ella ofrece. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma ha llevado el pan de cada día a su hogar. Por todo lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras (papas, cebollas, tomates, zanahorias, sandías, naranjas, limones, aguacates, piñas, etc.) de tal forma que pueda lograr su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Sandra  guarda un profundo agradecimiento con INTEGRAL ya que gracias a la confianza que le prestaron en el pasado logró establecer su negocio y seguir operando. Espera que esta vez la institución deposite nuevamente la confianza en ella con el nuevo préstamo.
texts.en:
Sandra del Transito is 36 years old and lives with her 4 young children. She is a fighter and a very hardworking woman. A few years ago she was able to open her own stand in front of the Municipal Market in her town, where she sells many types of fruit and vegetables. With much effort and dedication she has been able to maintain the business and thanks to God and the hard work she performs every day, the results have been very positive. 

Besides her amazing charisma, the most important thing to Sandra is her customers' satisfaction with the service they receive. Her business is located in a very busy area with a lot of foot traffic. Every day more people come looking for the products that she sells. Her dream is to continue to keep her business active because it is her primary source of income and has allowed her to provide for her family. 

This is why she has decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL. She plans to invest in her business by buying more fruits and vegetables (potatoes, onions, tomatoes, carrots, watermelon, oranges, lemons, avocados, pineapples and more) and hopefully achieve her goal of improving the standard of living of her family. Sandra is very grateful to INTEGRAL for the trust they placed in her by giving her a loan to start and to operate her business. She hopes they will trust her again and give her a new loan.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions, tomatoes, carrots, watermelons, oranges, lemons, avocados, pineapples and more.

loans.name: Jorge Pantaleón

texts.es: Jorge Pantaleón habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su querida esposa. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace ya varios años. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica ya que es muy transitada, en especial la tienda de Jorge ya que gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita. Jorge  tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio por mucho tiempo, por lo que siempre trata de mantenerse un paso adelante de la competencia y es así como ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales manifiestan estar satisfechos con el servicio prestado. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tienda y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: frijoles, azúcar, arroz, leche, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. Con  la fe puesta en Dios que de esta manera logrará mejorar sus niveles de ventas y de  ingresos que por consecuencia le ayudarán a mejorar su condición de vida y la de su  familia.
texts.en:
Jorge Pantaleón lives with his wife in their own home. He has owned a store for several years. His business is in a very strategic location, in a very busy area. Thanks to his charisma, Jorge has been able to win the trust of many people in the area where he lives. He has a lot of ideas for his business, which he has been putting into effect little by little. His dream is to keep running his business for many years, which is why he always tries to be a step ahead of his competition. He has already won the trust of his neighbors, who seems to be very satisfied with the service they receive in his store. 

He is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in his store and stock it with all kinds of products: beans, sugar, rice, milk, candies, oil, paper, detergent and other products that will help him widen his selection and attract more customers. He trusts in God that he will be able to increase his sales and income and improve his and his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, rice, milk, candies, oil, paper, detergent and more.

loans.name: Rubenia De Jesús

texts.es: Rubenia de Jesús de 32 años de edad, habita junto con su grupo familiar el cual lo conforman su compañero de de vida de 32 años y sus dos hijos de 13 y 6 años. Ella se dedica al comercio de productos por catalogo y a la elaboración de hermosas prendas de vestir. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse  a esta actividad por lo que ya posee amplia experiencia en el mercado de la costura y venta de los mismos. Es muy reconocida en la zona donde habita ya que gracias a su carisma y dedicación en su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada día la prefieren más. La señora Rubenia  trabaja muy duro para colaborar un poco con la economía del hogar ya que los ingresos recibidos por su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir las necesidades de toda la familia que cada vez son mayores. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y su mayor deseo es dar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Esta es la razón por la cual ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio con el fin de mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo y seguir recibiendo los frutos del mismo. El crédito lo quiere para comprar la materia prima necesaria (cosméticos, telas, hilos, elástico, botones, tijeras, agujas, etc.) para mantener abastecido su negocio de tal forma que pueda cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado.  Espera y confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables y logrará su objetivo de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rubenia de Jesús is 32 years old and lives with her family which includes her 32 year old companion and her children, aged 13 and 6. She makes a living selling products from a catalog and sewing beautiful garments. She has been in this line of work for many years and has a lot of experience in the clothing market and sales. She is well-known in the area where she lives and thanks to her charisma and her dedication to her work she has won the trust and the loyalty of many customers.  

Rubenia works very hard in order to contribute to the household budget. Her husband's income is not enough to cover all of their expenses which seem to be bigger every day. Her family is the most important thing to Rubenia and her greatest wish is to give a better future to her children. That is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL. She will invest it in her business in order to keep it running  and to keep enjoying the fruits of her labor. She will use the loan to buy materials (makeup, fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, scissors, needles) to keep her business in stock and to reach a larger portion of the market. She trusts in God and hopes to get good results and to achieve her goal of giving her family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy makeup, fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, scissors, needles, etc.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa María de veintiséis años de edad vive al lado de su padres. Ella tiene un puesto en el mercado municipal de la localidad donde reside y se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues tiene variedad de productos de buena calidad y a precios accesibles; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora con grandes metas por delante, piensa  que la acción es el paso fundamental para llegar al éxito; quiere dar ese paso, por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras y frutas por mayor, especies, granos básicos entre otros. Rosa María tienen fe que con su labor podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa María is 26 years old and lives with her parents. She has a locale in the town market where she lives and lately her clientele has grown since she has a variety of products at reasonable prices. Rosa is a resourceful woman with many goals ahead of her. She believes that action is the fundamental step to success. She wants to have that first step which is why she requested INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale vegetables, fruits, spices, basic grains, etc. Rosa María has faith that with her hard work she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale vegetables, fruits, spices, basic grains, etc

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is a hard-working entrepreneur who sells salted and fermented fish in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her salted and fermented fish business.

Ailyn has been in this business for 2 years. Ailyn earns additional income from charcoal sales.

Ailyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her salted/fermented fish business.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es:
José es un joven emprendedor de 24 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, actualmente se encuentra viviendo en casa de sus padres, la casa en la que vive se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Morrope, en donde los pobladores se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería exclusivamente, es un caserío donde habitan un aproximado de 100 familias. 

José desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado al trabajo diario y es por eso que hoy él se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como ganado ovino, caprino, y aves de corral, negocio que lo realiza en los mercados locales así como en los que están en caserío cercanos al suyo, adicionalmente se dedica la agricultura para lo que tiene sembrado cultivo de arroz, actividades a las que se dedica ya un aproximado de 6 años, y es que cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres en algunas actividades por lo que el quiere corresponderles con darles una mejor calidad de vida.

Ahora él esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 2500 Nuevos Soles los cuales los utilizará para la compra de fertilizantes para sus cultivos y alimentos balanceados para sus animales con los cuales les dará un mejor engorde y a la vez un mas rápido crecimiento para su comercialización.

José es un joven emprendedor que se ha hecho muy conocido en la zona por la gran responsabilidad que tiene con su trabajo y con su familia.
texts.en:
José is a 24 year old entrepreneur. He is single, does not have any children and lives with his parents. Their home is in the Morrope district, where most people work in agriculture and livestock. It is a village of about 100 families. 

Since he was very young, José has worked everyday and that is why now he works raising and selling animals like cows, sheep, goats and poultry. He sells the animals in the local markets and also in nearby villages. He also farms and has planted a rice harvest. He's being doing this work for the last 6 years. He relies on his parents to help him with certain tasks and he would like to be able to give them a better standard of living. 

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa which he will use to buy fertilizer for his crops and feed for his animals.
